package.name: Music wall and wallpaper filter
package.shortDescription: Filter your wallpaper/slideshow, set album art while playing

descriptionlist.description: A simple Xen widget to apply various customised image filters (blur, sepia, saturation and grayscale) to your wallpaper or a slideshow of images from Unsplash. When music is playing, it switches to your currently playing album art. Needs XenInfo.
